post.summary: Splitting presentations. Create one image per slide.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Export format. Default value is jpeg.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The last slide number for splitting, if is not specified splitting ends at the last slide of the document.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start slide number for splitting, if is not specified splitting starts from the first slide of the presentation.

parameters.name: destFolder
parameters.description: Folder on storage where images are going to be uploaded. If not specified then images are uploaded to same folder as presentation.

put.summary: Convert presentation from request content to format specified.

SelfUri.description: Gets or sets the link to this resource.

Accelerate.description: The percentage of duration accelerate behavior effect.

AutoReverse.description: True to automatically play the animation in reverse after playing it in the forward direction.

Decelerate.description: The percentage of duration decelerate behavior effect.

RepeatCount.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

RepeatDuration.description: The number of times the effect should repeat.

Restart.description: The way for a effect to restart after complete.

Speed.description: The percentage by which to speed up (or slow down) the timing.

TriggerShapeIndex.description: Index of the shape that triggers the sequence.

SelfUri.description: Gets or sets the link to this resource.

LinkType.description: Gets or sets the type of link.

Title.description: Gets or sets the title of link.

SelfUri.description: Gets or sets the link to this resource.
Gets or sets the link to this resource.
Gets or sets the link to this resource.
Gets or sets the link to this resource.
Gets or sets the link to this resource.
Gets or sets the link to this resource.

SaveAsZip.description: Get or sets flag for save presentation as zip file

SubDirectoryName.description: Get or set name of subdirectory in zip-file for store external files

ShowHiddenSlides.description:
Specifies whether the generated document should include hidden slides or not.
Default is false.

SvgResponsiveLayout.description: True to make layout responsive by excluding width and height attributes from svg container.

JpegQuality.description: Returns or sets a value determining the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

DeletePicturesCroppedAreas.description:
A boolean flag indicates if the cropped parts remain as part of the document. If true the cropped 
parts will removed, if false they will be serialized in the document (which can possible lead to a 
larger file)

NotesPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the notes on the page.

CommentsPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the comments on the page.

CommentsAreaWidth.description:
Gets or sets the width of the comment output area in pixels
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

CommentsAreaColor.description:
Gets or sets the color of comments area
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

ShowCommentsByNoAuthor.description: True if comments that have no author are displayed. (Applies only if comments are displayed).

NotesPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the notes on the page.

CommentsPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the comments on the page.

CommentsAreaWidth.description:
Gets or sets the width of the comment output area in pixels
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

CommentsAreaColor.description:
Gets or sets the color of comments area
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

TextCompression.description: Specifies compression type to be used for all textual content in the document.

EmbedFullFonts.description: Determines if all characters of font should be embedded or only used subset.

Compliance.description: Desired conformance level for generated PDF document.

SufficientResolution.description:
Returns or sets a value determining resolution of images inside PDF document.

Property affects on file size, time of export and image quality.
The default value is 96.

JpegQuality.description: Returns or sets a value determining the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

DrawSlidesFrame.description: True to draw black frame around each slide.

ShowHiddenSlides.description:
Specifies whether the generated document should include hidden slides or not.
Default is false.

SaveMetafilesAsPng.description: True to convert all metafiles used in a presentation to the PNG images.

Password.description: Setting user password to protect the PDF document.

EmbedTrueTypeFontsForASCII.description:
Determines if Aspose.Slides will embed common fonts for ASCII (33..127 code range) text.
Fonts for character codes greater than 127 are always embedded.
Common fonts list includes PDF's base 14 fonts and additional user specified fonts.

AdditionalCommonFontFamilies.description: Returns or sets an array of user-defined names of font families which Aspose.Slides should consider common.

NotesPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the notes on the page.

CommentsPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the comments on the page.

CommentsAreaWidth.description:
Gets or sets the width of the comment output area in pixels
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

CommentsAreaColor.description:
Gets or sets the color of comments area
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

ShowCommentsByNoAuthor.description: True if comments that have no author are displayed. (Applies only if comments are displayed).

ApplyImageTransparent.description: True to apply specified ImageTransparentColor  to an image.

ShowHiddenSlides.description:
Specifies whether the generated document should include hidden slides or not.
Default is false.

Compressed.description:
Specifies whether the generated SWF document should be compressed or not.
Default is true.

ViewerIncluded.description:
Specifies whether the generated SWF document should include the integrated document viewer or not.
Default is true.

ShowPageBorder.description: Specifies whether border around pages should be shown. Default is true.

ShowFullScreen.description: Show/hide fullscreen button. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

ShowPageStepper.description: Show/hide page stepper. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

ShowSearch.description: Show/hide search section. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

ShowTopPane.description: Show/hide whole top pane. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

ShowBottomPane.description: Show/hide bottom pane. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

ShowLeftPane.description: Show/hide left pane. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is true.

StartOpenLeftPane.description: Start with opened left pane. Can be overridden in flashvars. Default is false.

EnableContextMenu.description: Enable/disable context menu. Default is true.

LogoImage.description:
Image that will be displayed as logo in the top right corner of the viewer.
The image data is a base 64 string.
Image should be 32x64 pixels PNG image, otherwise logo can be displayed improperly.

LogoLink.description:
Gets or sets the full hyperlink address for a logo.
Has an effect only if a LogoImage is specified.

JpegQuality.description: Returns or sets a value determining the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

NotesPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the notes on the page.

CommentsPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the comments on the page.

CommentsAreaWidth.description:
Gets or sets the width of the comment output area in pixels
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

CommentsAreaColor.description:
Gets or sets the color of comments area
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

ShowCommentsByNoAuthor.description: True if comments that have no author are displayed. (Applies only if comments are displayed).

DpiX.description: Horizontal resolution, in dots per inch.

DpiY.description: Vertical resolution, in dots per inch.

ShowHiddenSlides.description:
Specifies whether the generated document should include hidden slides or not.
Default is false.

PixelFormat.description:
Specifies the pixel format for the generated images.
Read/write ImagePixelFormat.

NotesPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the notes on the page.

CommentsPosition.description: Gets or sets the position of the comments on the page.

CommentsAreaWidth.description:
Gets or sets the width of the comment output area in pixels
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

CommentsAreaColor.description:
Gets or sets the color of comments area
(Applies only if comments are displayed on the right).

ShowCommentsByNoAuthor.description: True if comments that have no author are displayed. (Applies only if comments are displayed).

VectorizeText.description: Determines whether the text on a slide will be saved as graphics.

MetafileRasterizationDpi.description: Returns or sets the lower resolution limit for metafile rasterization.

Disable3DText.description: Determines whether the 3D text is disabled in SVG.

DisableGradientSplit.description: Disables splitting FromCornerX and FromCenter gradients.

DisableLineEndCropping.description:
SVG 1.1 lacks ability to define insets for markers.
Aspose.Slides SVG writing engine has workaround for that problem:
it crops end of line with arrow, so, line doesn't overlap markers.
This option switches off such behavior.

JpegQuality.description: Returns or sets a value determining the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

DeletePicturesCroppedAreas.description:
A boolean flag indicates if the cropped parts remain as part of the document. If true the cropped 
parts will removed, if false they will be serialized in the document (which can possible lead to a 
larger file)

ExternalFontsHandling.description: Determines a way of handling externally loaded fonts.

ShowHiddenSlides.description:
Specifies whether the generated document should include hidden slides or not.
Default is false.

SaveMetafilesAsPng.description: True to convert all metafiles used in a presentation to the PNG images.

DrawSlidesFrame.description: True to draw black frame around each slide.

Conformance.description:
The conformance class to which the PresentationML document conforms.
Read/write Conformance.

InvertedSolidFillColor.description: Invert solid color for the series.

Smooth.description: True if curve smoothing is turned on. Applies only to line and scatter connected by lines charts.

PlotOnSecondAxis.description: True if the series is plotted on second value axis.

NumberFormatOfXValues.description: The number format for the series x values.

NumberFormatOfBubbleSizes.description: The number format for the series bubble sizes.

InvertIfNegative.description: True if the series shall invert its colors if the value is negative. Applies to bar, column and bubble series.

Explosion.description: The distance of an open pie slice from the center of the pie chart is expressed as a percentage of the pie diameter.

Thickness.description: Get or sets wall thickness as a percentage of the largest dimension of the plot volume.

PictureType.description: Get or sets mode of bar picture filling.

IsVisible.description: True if the axis is visible

HasTitle.description: Get or sets value determines visibility of title

DisplayUnit.description: The scaling value of the display units for the value axis

BaseUnitScale.description: The smallest time unit that is represented on the date axis

IsAutomaticMajorUnit.description: True the major unit of the axis is automatically assigned

MajorUnit.description: The major units for the date or value axis

MajorUnitScale.description: The major unit scale for the date axis

MajorTickMark.description: The type of major tick mark for the specified axis

IsAutomaticMinorUnit.description: True the minor unit of the axis is automatically assigned

MinorUnit.description: The minor units for the date or value axis

MinorUnitScale.description: The minor unit scale for the date axis

MinorTickMark.description: The type of minor tick mark for the specified axis

IsAutomaticMaxValue.description: True if the max value is automatically assigned

MaxValue.description: The maximum value on the value axis

IsAutomaticMinValue.description: True if the min value is automatically assigned

MinValue.description: The minimum value on the value axis

IsLogarithmic.description: True if the value axis scale type is logarithmic

LogBase.description: The logarithmic base. Default value is 10

CategoryAxisType.description: The type of the category axis

AxisBetweenCategories.description: True if the value axis crosses the category axis between categories. This property applies only to category axes, and it doesn't apply to 3-D charts

LabelOffset.description: The distance of labels from the axis. Applied to category or date axis. Value must be between 0% and 1000%.

IsPlotOrderReversed.description: True if MS PowerPoint plots data points from last to first

IsNumberFormatLinkedToSource.description: True if the format is linked to source data

NumberFormat.description: the format string for the Axis Labels

CrossType.description: The CrossType on the specified axis where the other axis crosses

CrossAt.description: The point on the axis where the perpendicular axis crosses it

IsAutomaticTickMarksSpacing.description: True for automatic tick marks spacing value

TickMarksSpacing.description: Specifies how many tick marks shall be skipped before the next one shall be drawn. Applied to category or series axis.
